attributes.action: Get all Sports back up and Running with precautions in place, allow 30% fans
attributes.additional_details:
Please stop your vendetta against the Leisure, Fitness, Elite and Competitive Sport industry.

Being able to watch Sport means a lot to a lot of people.

How on Earth do you honestly expect all of us 56 million people in the UK and Great Britain to seriously believe that sitting inside a pub is safer than going to a Leisure Club or watching Sport. 

Have you lost your brains on the Tube somewhere.

I have just seen video of armed police being sent to a gym in Liverpool. Have you lost your minds
attributes.background:
I want you to allow 30% or 40% Capacity fans back in to Stadiums in ALL Sports.

Get all Sports up and running and stop hassling Leisure Clubs
